alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LAURENS AND UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Union to 13 miles southeast of Laurens. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Joanna, Buffalo, Jonesville, Rose Hill State Park, Clinton, Cross Keys, Sedalia, and Kinards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
